price: 17. Sidaasaan ku abaal marinnay gaal- nimadoodii darteed; miyaan (sidaasoo kale) u abaal marinnaa waxaan aheyn kuwa abaal dhaca badan?
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيۡنَٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُواْۖ وَهَلۡ نُجَٰزِيٓ إِلَّا ٱلۡكَفُورَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: dhālika jazaynāhum bimā kafarū wahal nujāzī illā al-kafūra
